content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am happy to discuss the rental price with you. What do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to negotiate with you. I am a student and I want to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price. Can you tell me the initial rental price?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Sure, I am open to negotiating with you, Max. The initial rental price for the apartment is 600 Euros per month. However, I am willing to discuss a lower rental price if you can make a compelling case for why you deserve a lower rate.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am dependable and responsible, I am sure I can take good care of the apartment. I would also like to ask if I can have a discount for a longer rental period. Can you tell me more about that?

I also would like to know if I can have a discount for paying the rent in advance.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
I appreciate your interest in the apartment, Max. Thank you for your positive feedback about your reliability and responsibility. Regarding your request for a discount for a longer rental period, I am open to negotiating on that. If you sign a one-year lease instead of a monthly, I can offer you a discount of 50 Euros per month.

Regarding paying rent in advance, I am open to that as well. If you pay the entire rent for a year upfront, I can offer you a discount of 100 Euros per month. However, please note that this offer is only available if you sign a one-year lease.
name: Heinrich Heine
